summary: Tired of having to recruit many mages to cover all the magic groups? Well Not any-more, Annabella covers them all, and does them with POWER!
descriptionHtml:
WATCH THIS SPACE UPDATE!

More Good News!

After some screwing around with the CK, I've gone and improved Annabella alot more, including adding different styles for her.

As I get closer to making her standalone, I'll update you on more, but don't hold your breath, I have other things to do in RL.

If you have gone and upgraded her yourself, or done any codework that you think will be of benefit to everyone, send me a message and I'll look into making it a permanent addition.
WATCH THIS SPACE UPDATE END!

She stands taller then most other people in Skyrim, even her own kinsmen seem small compared to her towering stature. The Thalmor had her join to keep her in check, as her distrust of them made her a danger, but valuable asset all the same.

She will work with Dragon born so long as she gets her daily foot-rub and a small rest every now and then, a woman of her statue can't just run all day, it's a big world out there and a long way to fall.

Annabella, known as Anna in the short can be found wandering around inside the Radiant Raiment if you need her, and she is someone you want on your team.

Her skills are beyond most others, with mastery in Illusion, Alteration, Destruction, Conjuration and Restoration with full perk trees and many high level spells, plus her work gear is quite well made, though it looks like any other Thalmor Robes, best not seperate them, she doesn't like being naked.

After much upgrading and playesting, I'm close to putting out a new version of this mod.

Picture Credits!
CBBE Curvy Body - Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition by Caliente.
Royalrite set, Tera Armours Collection by asianboy345.
CBBE Conversion by WarMaster09.
Ethereal Elven Overhaul by nuska.
Hair - ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii.

Thanks to all these modders and their content for making not only mine, but many, many more games a better skyrim to experience.
author: Ironhide02
